channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 02:41 Air anxiety in Ivano-Frankivsk Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 02:41 Air anxiety in Ivano-Frankivsk Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Ivano-Frankivsk This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
